name: Anti Virus TD (beta version)
description:
This is a tower defence game created for programmers.  during the game you need to protect the computer cpu from errors and viruses,  sometimes you even need to fix errors in a given code during the game. All the pixeled images in the game was made by me. Also, the game info is written in binary.

The game is in development,  each level got 16 waves. Have fun and please give a feedback.

Game made with godot 3.
